thread.title: GCC Games: Issa al Adawi claims first gold for Oman
thread.title_full: GCC Games: Issa al Adawi claims first gold for Oman

author: muscatdaily@apexmedia.co.om (Muscat Daily News)
title: GCC Games: Issa al Adawi claims first gold for Oman
text:
Follow us on GCC Games: Issa al Adawi claims first gold for Oman Omanâ€™s Issa al Adawi looks at his timing after winning the 400m freestyle title on Monday Aiman al Kulaibi Issa al Adawi displays his gold medal Muscat Daily staff writer October 21, 2015 
Talented Omani swimmer Issa al Adawi earned the first gold for the sultanate at the second GCC Games in Dammam, Saudi Arabia on Monday when he won the 400m freestyle title. Issa clocked four minutes, 14.28 seconds to claim the gold. 
It was a successful day for the Omani swimmers as they scooped four medals to raise the overall medals haul to 15. Besides the gold, the swimmers won two silver and a bronze. 
Teammate Abdulrahman al Kulaibi claimed a silver in the 200m individual medley in a time of 2m15.37s. 
The second silver was picked by experienced swimmer Aiman al Kulaibi in the 100m backstroke event in 1m02.35s. 
Later, the national 4x200m relay team, comprising Issa, Abdulrahman, Aiman and Nidhal al Harassi, won the fourth medal of the night with a bronze in a time of 8m15.77s. 
Also on Monday, the national handball team recorded its second successive win with a 24-23 outcome over fancied Qatar to remain in medal contention in the five-team event. Oman next faces Bahrain before concluding its engagement with a match against hosts Saudi Arabia on Thursday. 
Earlier at the Games, Oman's weightlifters bagged six silver - three each by Muhanna al Abdali and Mohammed al Marhoobi - while the volleyball team settled for a bronze. The other medals came in camel racing (two silver, one bronze) and horse endurance racing (bronze). 
Also on the sidelines of the Games, the GCC Swimming Federation held a meeting under the chairmanship of Taha al Kishry, who is also the Oman Swimming Association chairman. Similar content
